scenes.narration_english: Heh heh... Kongpamine... Don't forget to subscribe and like!
scenes.image_prompt: Concert stage, multiple colored lights flashing, silhouettes of the audience are visible. Pomeranian dog in a white plush hooded cow costume, panting slightly and looking directly at the camera with a pleading expression.

video_prompt.character_action: Pomeranian dog panting and pleading for likes and subscriptions.
